text: Beatriz de Toledo Segall (25 July 1926 – 5 September 2018) was a Brazilian actress.Beatriz Segall fere o rosto em queda em rua do Rio, e Paes pede desculpa She was known for her role as Odete Roitman on the telenovela Vale Tudo (1988).“Por que chamariam a chata da Beatriz Segall?” She was born in Rio de Janeiro. Segall died on 5 September 2018 in Rio de Janeiro from respiratory failure at the age of 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1926 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian television actors Category:Actors from Rio de Janeiro
title: Beatriz Segall
